item.description: Update Brush Fire; INC#0543; 09:44AM; 1500 N Schuyler Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OumbfP; Beverly Crest; With firefighters now having handlines 100% around the fire, it is updated to less than 1/4 acre with NO structures threatened. They are mopping up the fire and the majority of resources expected to be released shortly. No injuries reported and no structures damaged.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC18 BC705 CM40 CM42 CW3A E108 E27 E278 E290 E41 E43 E58 E76 E90 E99 EM5 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 HT3 RA78 T78 T90; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0543; 09:13AM; 1500 N Schuyler Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OumbfP; Beverly Crest; Small area burning (less than 1/2 acre) in heavy brush. There is one structure threatened at this time. No additional resources are anticipated to be required. Firefighters are working to make access.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC18 BC705 CM40 CM42 CW3A E108 E27 E278 E290 E41 E43 E58 E76 E90 E99 EM5 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 HT3 RA78 T78 T90; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0351; 08:07AM; 1431 S Warnall Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hPapjE; Westwood; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 44 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is an ascending, hillside home (with basement) with two stories in the front and one in back. Firefighters located the fire in a basement level apartment. While smoke was showing from the attic vents, thorough investigation determined no extension into the attic space. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E237 E292 E37 E59 E71 RA92 T37 T92; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0351; 07:23AM; 1431 S Warnall Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hPapjE; Westwood; Two story, single family dwelling with light to moderate smoke showing. One additional task force requested (not reflected in this alert). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E37 E71 RA92 T92; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1067; 02:00PM; 12200 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V02zlF; Hansen Dam; CONTAINED: Firefighters contained the fire and most resources (All air and many ground based) will be released. LAFD is keeping six fire companies plus LACoFD to handle the mop up operations. No structures were damaged and no injuries reported.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 BC15 BP74 CM42 E10 E24 E274 E275 E289 E290 E298 E66 E7 E8139 E89 E9 E91 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H4 H5 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA5 HT3 RA98 RH114 RI200 T74 T75 T89 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1067; 01:28PM; 12200 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V02zlF; Hansen Dam; Approximately 1/4 acre burning in medium brush with (currently) light wind conditions. Angeles National Forest ( @angeles_NF ) are also sending a full brush response. There are no structures threatened at this time.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 BC15 BP74 CM42 E10 E24 E274 E275 E289 E290 E298 E66 E7 E89 E9 E91 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H4 H5 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA98 RH114 RI200 T74 T75 T89 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0899; 12:21PM; 7553 N Mclaren Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V5aXA7; West Hills; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was in one room and the attic. Initial reports of possible person trapped were incorrect and both occupants were outside the building upon LAFD arrival. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 BC17 E104 E105 E20 E296 E462 E472 E84 E94 RA106 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0899; 12:02PM; 7553 N Mclaren Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V5aXA7; West Hills; One story, single family dwelling with heavy fire from one room/attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 BC17 E104 E105 E20 E296 E462 E472 E84 E94 RA106 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Engine Response; INC#0613; 10:22AM; 15230 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tBe3QJ; Sylmar; The (snapped) high tension wire electrical pole is at an estimated 30 degree lean towards the roof of the adjacent strip mall. The strip mall is being evacuated as well as seven homes behind the mall. Three of the homes are currently occupied and the residents are being gathered together to be escorted out. The only means of egress is under the affected power pole so they will be carefully escorted by firefighters. Traffic will remain closed at the intersection. No injuries reported. There are sustained winds approximately 20-30mph with gusts towards 60mp which are affecting the hanging wires. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E298 E98 T98; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Engine Response; INC#0613; 09:38AM; 15230 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tBe3QJ; Sylmar; A high tension power pole snapped at the base (presumed due to high winds) and is leaning towards a one story strip mall (there is no contact with the structure at this time). The strip mall is being precautionarily evacuated. LA DWP notified to handle the downed pole. Traffic will be affected at the intersection of Roxford St and Glenoaks Blvd for an undetermined period of time - all drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. There are no injuries reported.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E298 E98 T98; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart
